name: Crucible Trails : Initial Rupture
description: A 3rd Person Action Adventure Game with a Medieval backdrop. Player is given an opportunity to follow the trails of Noah the protagonist.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Standard Audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: Intel(R) core(TM) i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Standard Audio
